price: او و افرادی را که همراهش بودند، در [آن] کشتیِ آکنده [از انسان و حیوان و کالا] نجات دادیم
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ فِي ٱلۡفُلۡكِ ٱلۡمَشۡحُونِ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu waman maʿahu fī al-ful'ki al-mashḥūni
